extDescription.message: Decode and copy URLs containing multicode.

msg_label_manualcopy.message: Copy the decoded URL using button

msg_label_shortcutscopy.message: Copy the decoded URL using shortcut keys

msg_alert_notaccess_clipboard.message:
Clipboard access not possible. Does not work in the browser you are using. 

 * This message can also be closed by pressing the "Esc" key.

msg_alert_shortcutscopy.message:
Copied the URL using the shortcut function. 

 * This message can also be closed by pressing the "Esc" key.

msg_alert_iconclickcopy.message:
Copied the URL using the extension icon click function. 

 * This message can also be closed by pressing the "Esc" key.
